movie.title: Wish Upon A Unicorn
movie.description_intro: Only eight-years old and little Mia has already had a pretty tough life filled with bad luck and hardship. After the loss of her mother, she, her sister Emma and her troubled father move to Grandma Rose's ranch in the middle of nowhere Montana. They're a broken family looking for a fresh start and needing a miracle. Then, one day in the woods, Mia discovers a unicorn colt- a magical creature that brings luck to anyone who believes in it. Thinking she's found the perfect fix for her family's problems, Mia sets out to use the Unicorn to make life better, only to discover the magic she yearned for was with her all along.
movie.description_full: Only eight-years old and little Mia has already had a pretty tough life filled with bad luck and hardship. After the loss of her mother, she, her sister Emma and her troubled father move to Grandma Rose's ranch in the middle of nowhere Montana. They're a broken family looking for a fresh start and needing a miracle. Then, one day in the woods, Mia discovers a unicorn colt- a magical creature that brings luck to anyone who believes in it. Thinking she's found the perfect fix for her family's problems, Mia sets out to use the Unicorn to make life better, only to discover the magic she yearned for was with her all along.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
movies.title_english: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
movies.title_long: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World (2019)
movies.summary: As Hiccup fulfills his dream of creating a peaceful dragon utopia, Toothless' discovery of an untamed, elusive mate draws the Night Fury away. When danger mounts at home and Hiccup's reign as village chief is tested, both dragon and rider must make impossible decisions to save their kind.
movies.description_full: As Hiccup fulfills his dream of creating a peaceful dragon utopia, Toothless' discovery of an untamed, elusive mate draws the Night Fury away. When danger mounts at home and Hiccup's reign as village chief is tested, both dragon and rider must make impossible decisions to save their kind.

movies.title: Aux
movies.summary: When two young boys playing in the woods discover a military bunker they unintentionally release the ghost of World War II auxiliary soldier who mistakenly believes the Nazis have landed.
movies.description_full: When two young boys playing in the woods discover a military bunker they unintentionally release the ghost of World War II auxiliary soldier who mistakenly believes the Nazis have landed.

movies.title: Qlimax: The Source
movies.summary: Embark on a journey into sound through the mystical world of Qlimax. An immersive audiovisual hardstyle trip that lets you follow the ways of The Source. Do you have what it takes to fulfill your destiny?
movies.description_full: Embark on a journey into sound through the mystical world of Qlimax. An immersive audiovisual hardstyle trip that lets you follow the ways of The Source. Do you have what it takes to fulfill your destiny?

movies.title: Survivor
movies.summary: A State Department employee newly posted to the American embassy in London is charged with stopping terrorists from getting into the U.S. That puts her right in the line of fire and she is targeted for death and framed for crimes. Discredited, she is forced to go on the run while she tries to clear her name and stop a large-scale terrorist attack set for New Year's Eve in Times Square.
